ingredients: 4  fresh nectarines, pitted and halved, 2 tablespoons melted unsalted butter, 4 tablespoons brown sugar
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 4g 19%, Cholesterol 15mg 5%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 28g 10%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 24g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 7mg 37%, Calcium 21mg 2%, Iron 1mg 3%, Potassium 293mg 6%
